categories.title: Design Patterns
categories.description: Master software design patterns through engaging stories and visual narratives
categories.longDescription: Design patterns are reusable solutions to common software design problems. They represent best practices evolved over time by experienced software developers. Learning design patterns helps you write more maintainable, flexible, and scalable code. Our visual storytelling approach makes these abstract concepts concrete and memorable.

subcategories.title: Creational Patterns
subcategories.description: Patterns that deal with object creation mechanisms

subcategories.title: Structural Patterns
subcategories.description: Patterns that deal with object composition and relationships

subcategories.title: Behavioral Patterns
subcategories.description: Patterns that deal with object collaboration and responsibility

categories.title: Algorithms & Data Structures
categories.description: Learn fundamental algorithms and data structures with interactive visualizations

categories.title: System Design
categories.description: Understand large-scale system architecture through real-world case studies

categories.title: Web Development
categories.description: Modern web development concepts from frontend to backend
